definitions.definition: One who advocates for the protection of the environment and biosphere from misuse from human activity through such measures as ecosystem protection, waste reduction and pollution prevention .
One who holds the view that environment , rather than heredity or culture , is the primary factor in the development of an individual or group.

main_definition: One who advocates for the protection of the environment and biosphere from misuse from human activity through such measures as ecosystem protection, waste reduction and pollution prevention .
secondary_definitions: ( anthropology , social sciences ) One who holds the view that environment , rather than heredity or culture , is the primary factor in the development of an individual or group.
